meanings.definition: To arrange or set up in a particular way
meanings.sent1: I will configure the chairs in a circle for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She needs to configure her computer settings for better performance.
meanings.sent3: Trying to configure a puzzle without all the pieces is like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was configured to think in a linear fashion, making creativity a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The artist configured the colors in a way that brought the painting to life.

meanings.definition: To determine the arrangement or form of
meanings.sent1: Let's configure the layout of the room before the event.
meanings.sent2: The architect will configure the structure of the new building.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to configure the seating plan for the teddy bear picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was configured in such a way that it lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The chef configured the ingredients to create a masterpiece dish.

meanings.definition: To adapt or adjust to a particular situation or purpose
meanings.sent1: We need to configure our strategy to fit the new regulations.
meanings.sent2: He had to configure his speech to suit the audience's preferences.
meanings.sent3: It's funny to configure a cat to enjoy swimming lessons.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was configured to love unconditionally, no matter the circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The team configured their approach to win the game against all odds.
